attributes.action: Stop installations of underground heating to golf courses etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
General public brainwashed to reduce carbon footprint by engaging in energy efficient activity,then we hear of a Golf course fitting undersoil heating.
This makes a mockery of any climate change policy, the goverment should put a stop to this practice and any other blatant waste of power simply for extra profit.
